1.Vector Age
```{r}
age_ <- c(34, 28, 22, 36, 27, 18, 52, 39, 42, 29, 35, 31, 27, 22, 37, 34, 19, 20, 57, 49, 50, 37, 46, 25, 17, 37, 42, 53, 41,
51, 35, 24, 33, 41.)
length(age_)
```
2.Reciprocal Age
```{r}
age_ <-c(34, 28, 22, 36, 27, 18, 52, 39, 42, 29, 35, 31, 27, 22, 37, 34, 19, 20, 57, 49, 50, 37, 46, 25, 17, 37, 42, 53, 41,
51, 35, 24, 33, 41.)
recipro_age <- 1/age_
print(recipro_age)
```
3.New Age
```{r}
age_ <-c(34, 28, 22, 36, 27, 18, 52, 39, 42, 29, 35, 31, 27, 22, 37, 34, 19, 20, 57, 49, 50, 37, 46, 25, 17, 37, 42, 53, 41,
51, 35, 24, 33, 41.)
new_age <-c (age_, 0, age_)
print(new_age)
```
4.Sort Val. Age
```{r}
age_ <-c(34, 28, 22, 36, 27, 18, 52, 39, 42, 29, 35, 31, 27, 22, 37, 34, 19, 20, 57, 49, 50, 37, 46, 25, 17, 37, 42, 53, 41,
51, 35, 24, 33, 41.)
sort_age <- sort(age_)
print(sort_age)
```
Min and Max Age
```{r}
age_ <-c(34, 28, 22, 36, 27, 18, 52, 39, 42, 29, 35, 31, 27, 22, 37, 34, 19, 20, 57, 49, 50, 37, 46, 25, 17, 37, 42, 53, 41,
51, 35, 24, 33, 41.)
min_age <- min(age_)
max_age <- max(age_)
print(min_age)
print(max_age)
```

7. Doubled Data
```{r}
data_ <- c(2.4, 2.8, 2.1, 2.5, 2.4, 2.2, 2.5,
2.3, 2.5, 2.3, 2.4, 2.7)
data_doubled <- data_*2
print(data_doubled)
```
